long_description: The women's Patagonia Insulated Torrentshell jacket offers robust, no-nonsense protection for brutally cold, soaking wet conditions. PrimaLoft(R) insulation and a waterproof shell see you through. Waterproof, breathable 2-layer nylon ripstop shell has a Durable Water Repellent finish to help water bead up and roll off. PrimaLoft Eco polyester insulation is 70% recycled and toasty warm. Internal quilt pattern holds insulation in place for durability. Helmet-compatible, fully adjustable hood has a laminated visor for visibility in poor conditions. Watertight, coated zippers are on center-front and all exterior pockets. Zippered pockets: 2 handwarmer, 1 exterior chest, 1 internal; plus, 1 internal drop-in pocket. Patagonia Insulated Torrentshell jacket for women provides an adjustable hem and cuffs to seal in warmth.
short_description: The women's Patagonia Insulated Torrentshell jacket offers robust, no-nonsense protection for brutally cold, soaking wet conditions. PrimaLoft(R) insulation and a waterproof shell see you through.
